amendment.description: To increase the amount of funds authorized to be appropriated to the National Recording Preservation Foundation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4973 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4973 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S5092; text: CR S5092) To increase the amount of funds authorized to be appropriated to the National Recording Preservation Foundation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4973 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4973 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Blunt.
